items.title: Enhanced Accuracy for New User Setup and Trial Status
items.summary: We've enhanced the user creation process to automatically provide correct default values and company-specific options in new user forms. This update streamlines administrator workflows and ensures accurate assignment of trial user status, improving overall data integrity.

items.title: Improved Consistency for Employee Import Template Export
items.summary: We've enhanced the export process for the employee import template. This update ensures more consistent rendering and formatting of the XLSX file, providing greater reliability and clarity for your employee data imports.

items.title: Dashboard now includes a dedicated support link
items.summary: A dedicated support link has been added to the dashboard. This enhancement enables direct access to assistance and resources, streamlining the process for obtaining help and information.

items.title: Improved Visibility of All Safety Data Sheets
items.summary: Previously, some users could only view a limited number of their Safety Data Sheets (SDS) in certain lists. We have updated the system to ensure that all SDS documents are fully visible, providing a comprehensive view of your chemical library. This enhancement improves the completeness and reliability of your compliance information.

items.title: Public Changelog Now Available
items.summary: We're introducing a new public changelog that keeps you informed about updates across the EHS Dashboard platform. You can now view clear, up-to-date information about new features, improvements, and updates to our services. This changelog provides transparency into the ongoing enhancements we're making to better serve you.
